name: Bound (itch) (AtticusFinn)
description:
A space shoot em up where you're bound to the enemy

In the heat of the battle you ended up stuck to a commander ship from the opposition. It's up to you to survive the journey - the commander will do whatever he can to bring you down, even if it kills you both...

CONTROLS
Z = Switch aircraft position
X = Shoot (white ship only)

R = Restart

Made for GMTK Jam 2021
Theme: Joined Together

Note: My programming skills are pretty basic so it kept my from being able to really explore the concept fully by adding more mechanics but hey I managed to finish the game which is more than I thought I'd be able to achieve!
